title: Doug LaMalfa
deleted: LaMalfa has a B+ rating from [[NumbersUSA]], an organization that advocates lower rates of legal immigration.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.numbersusa.com/content/my/congress/9494/gradescoresheet|title=Representative Doug LaMalfa, Report Card | NumbersUSA - For Lower Immigration Levels|website=NumbersUSA.com|access-date=April 3, 2017|archive-date=April 4, 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170404045637/https://www.numbersusa.com/content/my/congress/9494/gradescoresheet|url-status=live}}</ref>

title: Doug LaMalfa
deleted: LaMalfa's website states that he is "proud to have earned an A rating and the endorsements of the [[National Rifle Association|NRA]] and [[Gun Owners of America]]."<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.douglamalfa.com/issues-and-solutions/|title=Issues and Solutions {{!}} Doug LaMalfa for U.S. Representative|website=www.douglamalfa.com|language=en-US|access-date=2018-03-03|archive-date=March 4, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180304054658/http://www.douglamalfa.com/issues-and-solutions/|url-status=live}}</ref> He has received $13,500 from the NRA.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.opensecrets.org/industries/summary.php?ind=Q13&recipdetail=H&sortorder=S&cycle=All|title=Gun Rights: Money to Congress | OpenSecrets|website=www.opensecrets.org|access-date=March 3, 2018|archive-date=March 4, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180304113212/https://www.opensecrets.org/industries/summary.php?ind=Q13&recipdetail=H&sortorder=S&cycle=All|url-status=live}}</ref>

title: Doug LaMalfa
added: As of October 2021, LaMalfa had voted in line with [[Joe Biden]]'s stated position 10.3% of the time.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Bycoffe |first1=Anna Wiederkehr and Aaron |title=Does Your Member Of Congress Vote With Or Against Biden? |url=https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/biden-congress-votes/doug-lamalfa/|access-date=28 October 2021 |language=en |date=2021-10-22}}</ref>
